title: Nuts and Bolts Puzzle
description: Ever gotten lost in a maze of planks and screws when trying to build an IKEA shelf?  Well, Nuts and Bolts Puzzle is like the opposite of that!  Instead of frantically trying to assemble stuff, youâ€™re gleefully taking everything apart and the best part is: no confusing instructions required.  In this fun online game on OnlineGames.
